explanation: This is a number input question and will give the user a number input keyboard, it should be used for entering numbers that may contain decimal places, if you just what the user to enter whole number then use a Telephone input
label: First Name
name: first-name
helpText: This is your first name, e.g. John

errors.message: This is a required field and must be filled in
You can only have entered characters that are not valid, you may only input 0-9 and a decimal point
